commit message: Initial checkin.
updated icon. placeholder
New icons from the Android Asset Studio
Add About dialog.  First public release.
New icon; display natural screen orientation; add version number to about box; now installs on SD card.
Display current orientation in relation to natural orientation.
Display touchscreen information
Remove generated assets checked in by mistake
Add support for displaying long/wide status of screen
Add MIT license
Add README, like github recommends
Add the masters for generating assets such as app icon
Add Pixelmator source file for the screen size/density swatches
Update to API level 13 (Android 3.2); Add width in DP, height in DP, smallestWidth DP, pixel format, refresh rate. Improve label alignment
Bump version to 1.0.2
Update icons, add xhdpi icon
Up to API 14/SDK 15; Refactor all the display interrogation into a separate model object, to facilitate other forms of presentation (email message, etc)
Add support to email/share a text summary of screen stats.
Bump version to 1.0.3
Update icons.  New color scheme, and old ones were a little janky
Fix bug in layout file; remove stale Proguard config
Bump to API 17; add support for xxhdpi density; add support for BGRA_8888 courtesy of Lawrence D'Oliveiro (https://github.com/ldo/screeninfo_android)
Add xxhdpi file for Nexus 10 spiffiness (see: https://plus.google.com/118292708268361843293/posts/ePQya3KsTjW )

Display true screen size including OS-level decorations like the status bar; also, display the screen size and density classification buckets in the onscreen list since they can vary from the asset selections (as on the Nexus 7, which selects from large-hdpi but is actually a large-tvdpi device).
Add shameless plug for app in shared reports
Be a little less clumsy in the way we generate the summary text report
Report 'not available' if we cannot reliably determine the true screen size (API level < 17)
Add a label over the framework-selected resource indicating what it is
Update label for framework resource
Privacy Policy for users of the application
screenWidthDp and smallestScreenWidthDp unsupported on pre SDK 13 devices
revert android target change

Merge pull request #1 from chatch/master

screenWidthDp crash on pre SDK 13 devices
1.0.6; fix widthDp/smallestWidthDp calculation for pre-API13 devices.  While these devices can't take advantage of smallestWidthDp, might as well calculate the proper value.
Pushing eclipse settings up to github
add icon to README

Merge pull request #2 from paulvi/patch-1

add icon to README
MP: Convert Eclipse project to Android Studio
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/mportuesisf/ScreenInfo
MP: update for AS/gradle
MP: fix build dir for AS/gradle
MP: remove app/build folder from those tracked
MP: set up AS to use git
MP: fix path to icon
MP: Convert from textile to markdown
MP: bump to api 22, add xxxhdpi (no drawables yet)
MP: add xxxhdpi drawables
MP: Add Play store banner

Merge pull request #8 from mportuesisf/xxxhdpi-update

MP: bump to api 22, add xxxhdpi (no drawables yet)
